insert.foreach: INTO CP_PARKING_INFO ( PARKING_ID, PARKING_TITLE, PARKING_ADDR, LAT, LOT ) VALUES ( #{item.parkingId}, #{item.parkingTitle}, #{item.parkingAddr}, #{item.lat}, #{item.lot} )
